name: Kirari Momobami
description:
This is a loRA of Kirari Momobami,a character from anime and manga "Kakegurui"

Use loRA at 0.6 and 0.7 for the best match, sometimes Kirari can become brunette at low values, also, unfortunately, the color of her lips is not transferred to the model so use "blue lips"

Also I've experimented with different models and styles and I can say with almost 100% certainty that it works well with a large number of anime models
